entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
